info.title: SkillMeat API
info.description: REST API for SkillMeat collection manager

get.description:
Basic health check endpoint that returns service status.
    Used for simple availability checks by load balancers.

    Returns HTTP 200 if service is running.

Detailed health check endpoint that includes component status and system information.
    Used for comprehensive monitoring and diagnostics.

    Checks the health of:
    - Collection manager
    - Configuration manager
    - File system access

    Returns HTTP 200 if all components are healthy.
    Returns HTTP 503 if any critical component is unhealthy.

Readiness check endpoint for Kubernetes and container orchestrators.
    Indicates whether the service is ready to accept traffic.

    Returns HTTP 200 if service is ready.
    Returns HTTP 503 if service is not ready (still initializing).

schema.title: Response Readiness Check Health Ready Get

get.description:
Liveness check endpoint for Kubernetes and container orchestrators.
    Indicates whether the service is alive (not deadlocked/crashed).

    Returns HTTP 200 if service is alive.
    Should never return 503 unless the service is truly unresponsive.

schema.title: Response Liveness Check Health Live Get

ArtifactSyncRequest.title: ArtifactSyncRequest
ArtifactSyncRequest.description:
Request schema for syncing an artifact.

If project_path is provided: Syncs FROM project TO collection (reverse sync).
If project_path is omitted: Syncs FROM upstream source TO collection (update).

ProjectDeploymentInfo.description:
Deployment information for a single project.

Provides per-project deployment details including
modification status and deployment timestamp.

ProjectDetail.title: ProjectDetail
ProjectDetail.description:
Detailed information about a project including all deployments.

Extends ProjectSummary with complete list of deployed artifacts
and aggregated statistics.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of items for this page

ProjectListResponse.title: ProjectListResponse
ProjectListResponse.description:
Paginated response for project listings.

Extends the generic paginated response with project-specific items.

ProjectSummary.title: ProjectSummary
ProjectSummary.description:
Summary information about a project with deployments.

Provides high-level project metadata including deployment counts
and last deployment time.

name.title: Name
name.description: New project name (1-100 characters, letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores only)

ProjectUpdateRequest.title: ProjectUpdateRequest
ProjectUpdateRequest.description: Request schema for updating a project.

bundle_path.title: Bundle Path
bundle_path.description: Path to the bundle file to publish

PublishRequest.title: PublishRequest
PublishRequest.description:
Request model for publishing a bundle to marketplace.

Specifies the bundle path and additional metadata for the listing.

broker.title: Broker
broker.description: Broker the bundle was published to

listing_url.title: Listing Url
listing_url.description: URL to view the listing (if approved)

PublishResponse.title: PublishResponse
PublishResponse.description:
Response model for publish operations.

Contains submission details and status information.

expires_at.title: Expires At
expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when link expires (None if no expiration)

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when link was created

permission_level.title: Permission Level
permission_level.description: Permission level for share link (viewer, importer, editor)

expiration_hours.title: Expiration Hours
expiration_hours.description: Hours until share link expires (None for no expiration)

max_downloads.title: Max Downloads
max_downloads.description: Maximum number of downloads allowed (None for unlimited)

ShareLinkUpdateRequest.title: ShareLinkUpdateRequest
ShareLinkUpdateRequest.description: Request to create or update a bundle share link.

TopArtifactItem.title: TopArtifactItem
TopArtifactItem.description:
Single artifact in the top artifacts list.

Represents an artifact with its usage statistics.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of items for this page

TopArtifactsResponse.title: TopArtifactsResponse
TopArtifactsResponse.description:
Paginated response for top artifacts by usage.

Returns artifacts sorted by usage frequency with pagination support.

period.title: Period
period.description: Time period type (hour, day, week, month)

deployment_count.title: Deployment Count
deployment_count.description: Number of deployments in this period

usage_count.title: Usage Count
usage_count.description: Total usage events in this period

unique_artifacts.title: Unique Artifacts
unique_artifacts.description: Number of unique artifacts used in this period

top_artifact.title: Top Artifact
top_artifact.description: Most used artifact in this period

TrendDataPoint.title: TrendDataPoint
TrendDataPoint.description:
Single data point in a usage trend.

Represents aggregated usage data for a specific time period.

total_periods.title: Total Periods
total_periods.description: Number of periods in the response

TrendsResponse.title: TrendsResponse
TrendsResponse.description:
Response for usage trends over time.

Provides time-series data for usage patterns and trends.

project_path.title: Project Path
project_path.description: Path to project directory (uses CWD if not specified)

UndeployRequest.title: UndeployRequest
UndeployRequest.description: Request to undeploy (remove) an artifact from a project.

field.title: Field
field.description: Name of the field that failed validation

message.title: Message
message.description: Error message describing the validation failure

ValidationErrorDetail.title: ValidationErrorDetail
ValidationErrorDetail.description:
Validation error detail for a single field.

Provides structured information about validation errors
that occur during request processing.

file_path.title: File Path
file_path.description: File path if issue relates to specific file

VersionGraphNodeResponse.title: VersionGraphNodeResponse
VersionGraphNodeResponse.description:
Node in version graph visualization.

Recursive structure representing the version tree,
where each node can have multiple children representing
deployments or forks.

last_updated.title: Last Updated
last_updated.description: Timestamp when graph was last computed

VersionGraphResponse.title: VersionGraphResponse
VersionGraphResponse.description:
Complete version graph for an artifact.

Provides hierarchical view of artifact versions across
collection and all project deployments, with aggregated
statistics.

stream_url.title: Stream Url
stream_url.description: SSE stream URL for progress updates (if supported)

env_file_path.title: Env File Path
env_file_path.description: Path to .env file with environment variables
